articles.title: A 7-Billion-Year-Old Ice Ball Just Entered Our Solar System - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A newly discovered ice comet from deep space may be over 7 billion years old, making it the most ancient comet scientists have ever seen.
articles.content:
A newly discovered ice comet from deep space may be over 7 billion years old, making it the most ancient comet scientists have ever seen. (Artist’s concept.) Credit: SciTechDaily.com
